RecitationInstruction.ab: mazdaiiasnō aɱī] mazdaiiasnō ahmī OD OL Y āstūitiš (VVrS12.14) 4025, 4050; mazdaiiasnō ahmī mazdaiiasnō zaraϑuštrəš OD āstūitiš (VVrS12.14) 4000; mazdaiiasnō ahmī mazdaiiasnō zaraϑuštrəš cygwn npšt' gwptn' āstīitiš (VVrS12.14) 4030; mazdaiiasnō ahmī mazdaiiasnō zaraϑuštrəš gwptn' OD OL Y āstūitiš (VVrS12.14) 4045; mazdaiiasnō ahmī mazdaiiasnō zaraϑuštrəš frauuarāne āstūitascā OD OL Y āstūitiš (VVrS12.14) 4000; mazdaiiasnō aɱi mazdaiiasnō OD āstuuitiš (VVrS12.14) 4200; mazdaiiasnō aɱī mazdaiiasnō zaraϑuštrəš OD āstuuitiš (VVrS12.14) 4210; mazdaiiasnō aɱi OD āstūitiš (VVrS12.14) 4240, 480, 4370, 4515.
